description: App is clean and easy to use, For an spotify player it needs all the features of an native spotify app such as the fading transitions spotify as and needs to keep users logged into account when the app is closed. Also needs a button to download songs locally. Overall decent app
Just need little improvement, add an option to open YouTube channel just like olivia
The app is extremely easy to use and i would recommend it to anyone

summary: Attractive interface...when is wasn't hanging or crashing

description: it is the best there is. one single app to listen to all of your favorite musics from all the online apps. doesn't need for spotify premium and handle soundcloud playlists just fine. would give 10/10 easily.
summary: best music player for Spotify and Soundcloud

description: Accounts login needs to be persistent.
Even better UI than Spotify or Youtube Music

Unfortunately, it's pretty much unusable for me right now. I get the welcome screen on every launch (even though everything else loads fine), while the last playing song starts automatically (reinstalls didn't help). Also, there's no 'go to album' button or sorting by track number. Moosync would certainly be my go-to music player, if it weren't for these things. I'll be watching for updates.
When opening it gets stuck, it just wastes my time
